FLOW.COMMENT: This is the only step where you set errorInfo/ServiceName

MAP.COMMENT: This is the only step where you set errorInfo/ServiceName

Values.value: About to set default value for geo code

Values.value: About to convert all inputs to Upper Case
About to do the database lookup for universal value
